juzs.text: Zanmei zhenzhu, chaojue wanwu, ta zai yiye zhi jian, shi ta de puren, cong jin si xing dao yuan si. Wo zai yuan si de sizhou jiang fu, yibian wo zhaoshi ta wo de yibufen jixiang. Zhenzhu que shi quan cong de, que shi quan ming de
Wo ceng ba jingdian shangci mu sa, bingyong zuo yiselie de zisun de xiangdao. (Wo shuo):“Nimen buyao she wo er caiqu renhe jianhu zhe!”
Wo ceng shi qi yu nu ha tongzhougongji zhe de zisun a! Ta yuan shi yige gan'en de puren
Wo ceng zai jingdian li qishi dui yiselie de houyi panjue (shuo):“Nimen biding yao zai da dishang liang ci zuoluan, nimen biding hen aoman.”
Dang di yici zuoluan de yue qi lailin de shihou, wo paiqian wo de xuduo qiangda de puren qu chengzhi nimen, tamen jiu sousuole zhuzhai, na shi yao luxing de nuoyan
Ranhou, wo wei nimen huifule dui tamen de youshi, wo yi caifu he zisun zizhu nimen, wo shi nimen gengjia fushu

(Wo shuo):“Ruguo nimen xingshan, name, nimen shi wei ziji er xingshan; ruguo nimen zuo'e, name, nimen shi wei ziji er zuo'e.” Dang di er ci zuoluan de yue qi lailin de shihou,(wo you paiqian tamen), yibian tamen shi nimen bian cheng wei choumeikulian de, yibian tamen xiang tou yi ci nayang zai ru jin si, yibian tamen ba ziji suo zhanling di difang jiayi cuihui
(Ruguo nimen huigai), nimen de zhu huoxu hui lianmin nimen. Ruguo nimen chongxin weikang wo, wo jiang chongxin chengzhi nimen. Wo yi huo yu wei buxindao zhe de jianyu
Zhe bu “gulanjing” bi yindao ren yu zhi zhengzhidao, bing yugao xingshan de xinshi, tamen jiangyao xiangshou zuida de baochou
(Hai yugao) bu xin houshi zhe, wo yi wei tamen yubeile tongku de xingfa
Ren qidao huohuan, xiang qidao xingfu yiyang, ren shi jizao de

Wo yi zhouye wei liang zhong jixiang, wo mo diao heiye de jixiang, bing yi baizhou de jixiang wei mingliang de, yibian nimen xunqiu cong nimen de zhu fachu de enhui, yibian nimen zhidao lifa he suanshu. Wo mingbai di jieshi yiqie shiwu
Wo shi mei geren de xingwei fuzhuo zai ta de bozi shang. Zai fuhuo ri, wo yao wei mei geren quchu yige zhankai de benzi
(shuo:)“Ni du ni de benzi ba! Jintian, ni yi zu wei ziji de qingsuan ren.”
Shei zunxun zhengdao, shei zi shou qi yi; shei wu ru mitu, shei zi shou qi hai. Yige fu zui zhe, bu fu taren de zui. Paiqian shizhe zhiqian, wo bu chengfa (renhe ren)
Dang wo yao huimie yige shi zhen de shihou, wo mingling qizhongguo anle shenghuo zhe fucong wo, dan tamen fangdang bu jian, suoyi ying shou xingfa de panjue. Yushi wo huimie tamen
Zai nu ha zhihou, wo hui mie liao ruogan shidai. Ni de zhu duiyu qi puren de zuixing, zu wei che zhi zhe he mingcha zhe

Fan yu huode xianshi shenghuo zhe, wo jiang zai xianshi yi wo suo yiyu de baoda tamen zhong wo suo yiyu zhe. Ranhou, wo jiang yi huo yu chengzhi tamen, tamen jiang shou zebei, zao qi juedi jinru huo yu
Fan yu huode houshi, bing wei houshi er jinle nuli de xindao zhe, zhe deng ren de nuli shi you baochou de
Zhe deng ren he na deng ren, wo du yao yi ni de zhu de shangci zizhu tamen, ni de zhu de shangci, bushi shou zu'ai de
Ni kan wo zenyang shi tamen zhong de yibufen ren chaoyue ling yibufen ren; houshi que shi pinji geng gao, youyue geng shen de
Ni buyao shi renhe wu yu zhenzhu tong shou chongbai, yimian ni bian cheng shou zebei, zao yiqi de.§

Ni de zhu ceng xialing shuo: Nimen yingdang zhi chongbai ta, yingdang xiaojing fumu. Ruguo ta lia zhong de yiren huozhe liang ren zai ni de tangshang dadao laomai, name, ni buyao dui ta lia shuo:“Pei!” Buyao he chi ta lia, ni yingdang dui ta lia shuo you limao dehua
Ni yingdang wei lianmin er bigongbijing de fushi ta lia, ni yingdang shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni lianmin ta lia, jiu xiang wo nian you shi ta lia yangyu wo nayang.”
Nimen de zhu shi zui zhi dao nimen de xinqing de. Ruguo nimen shi shanliang de, name, ta duiyu changchang huiguo zhe que shi zhi she de
Ni yingdang ba qinqi, pinmin, luke suo ying de de zhouji fen gei tamen, ni buyao huihuo
huihuo zhe que shi emo de pengyou, emo yuan shi gufu zhu en de
Ruguo ni bixu qiu de ni suo xiwang de cong zhu jiang shi de enhui hou caineng zhouji tamen, name, ni yinggai dui tamen shuo wenhe dehua
Ni buyao ba ni de shou shu zai ziji de bozi shang, ye buyao bashou wanquan shen kai, yimian ni bian cheng huihen de shou zebei zhe
Ni de zhu bi wei tasuo yiyu zhe er shi jiyang fuyu, bi wei tasuo yiyu zhe er shi jiyang jiongpo. Ni de zhu duiyu ta de zhong pu, que shi che zhi de, que shi mingcha de
Nimen buyao yinwei pa pinqiong er shahai ziji de ernu, wo gongji tamen he nimen. Shahai tamen que shi dazui
Nimen buyao jiejin si tong, yinwei si tong que shi xialiu de shi, zhe xingjing zhen elie
Nimen buyao weibei zhenzhu de jinling er sharen, chufei yinwei zhengyi. Wugu'er bei sha zhe, wo yi ba quanbing shouyu ta de qinqi, dan ta buke lan sha, ta que shi shou yuanzhu de
Nimen buyao jiejin gu er de caichan, chufei yizhao zui youliang de fangshi, zhidao ta chengnian. Nimen yingdang luxing nuoyan; nuoyan que shi yao bei shenwen de shi
Dang nimen mai liang de shihou, yingdang liang zu fenliang, nimen yingdang shiyong gongping de cheng cheng huowu, zhe shi shanshi, shi jieju zui you de
Ni buyao suicong ni suo bu zhidao de yanxing, ermu he xinling dou shi yao bei shenwen de
Ni buyao jiao'ao ziman di zai dadishang xingzou, ni jue buneng ba dadi ta chuan, jue buneng yu shan shi bi gao
Zhexie shi, qi elie shi ni de zhu suo yanwu de
Zhe shi ni de zhu suo qishi ni de zhihui, ni buyao shi renhe shenming yu zhenzhu tong shou chongbai, fouze, ni jiang zai shou zebei he zao qi jue de qingkuang xia bei touru huo yu
Nandao nimen de zhu ba nan'er shangci nimen, er yi zhong tianshen wei ziji de nu'er ma? Nimen dique shuo chu huangmiu dehua
Zai zhe bu “gulanjing” li, wo que yi fanfu shenshu zhege zongzhi, yibian tamen mingji. Zhe zhong shenshu zhi hui shi tamen gengjia zengwu
Ni shuo:“Jiaruo you xuduo shenming he ta zai yiqi, youru tamen suo shuo di nayang, name, naxie shenling biding xiangfangshefa yu baozuo de zhu zheng heng.”
Zansong zhenzhu, chaojue wanwu, ta jue ran chao hu tamen suo shuo de
Qi ceng tian he da di, yiji wan you dou zansong ta chaojue wanwu, wu yi wu bu zansong ta chaojue wanwu, dan nimen bu liaojie tamen de zansong. Ta que shi rongren de, que shi zhi she de
Dang nimen songdu “gulanjing” de shihou, wo zai ni he buxin houshi zhe zhi jian anzhi yi du yin wei de pingzhang

Wo zai tamen de xin shang jiale xuduo zhaozi, yimian tamen liaojie “gulanjing”; you zai tamen de er li zaole zhong ting, dang ni zai “gulanjing” li zhi ti dao ni de zhu de shihou, tamen zengwu de li qu
Wo zui zhidao tamen weihe yao qingting ni song jing, dangshi tamen lai qingting ni song jing, bingqie mimi de tanhua. Dangshi bu yi zhemen shuo:“Nimen zhishi shuncong yige zhongle moshu de ren.”
Ni kan tamen zenyang wei ni dale xuduo biyu, dan tamen suo shuo de dou bu zhongken, tamen buneng huode yitiao chulu
Tamen shuo:“Women bian cheng kugu he chentu hou, nandao women huan yiding hui bei fuhuo chengwei xinren ma?”§
Ni shuo:“Jinguan nimen bian cheng shi tou, huo tie kuai

huo nimen renwei geng nanyu jieshou shengming de shenme dongxi ba.” Tamen jiang shuo:“Shei shi women fuhuo ne?” Ni shuo:“Chuci chuangzao nimen de zhu.” Tamen jiang dui ni yaotou shuo:“Zhe jian shi jiang zai he shi fasheng ne?” Ni shuo:“Zhe jian shi huoxu shi linjinle.”
Zai na ri, ta jiang zhaohuan nimen, er nimen jiang yi rongci daying ta. Nimen jiang caixiang ziji zai fenmu li zhi douliule yihui'er
Ni gaosu wo de pu renmen: Jiao tamen shuo zhe ju zui youmei dehua ──emo biding yao lijian tamen, emo que shi renlei de ming di ──
“nimen de zhu shi zui zhidao nimen de, ta yao lianmin nimen jiu lianmin nimen; ta yao chengfa nimen jiu chengfa nimen.” Wo mei paiqian ni zuo tamen de jianhu zhe
Ni de zhu shi zhidao tiandi wanwu de. Wo que yi shi yibufen xianzhi chaoyue ling yibufen; wo ceng yi jingdian shangci da wu de
Ni shuo:“Nimen she zhenzhu er cheng wei shenming zhe, nimen qidao tamen ba! Tamen buneng ti nimen xiao zai, ye buneng ti nimen jia huo.”

Tamen suo cheng wei shenming zhe, zishen qiu jin zhu zhi jie. Bi tamen geng jin yu zhu zhe ye qiu jin zhu zhi jie, tamen xiwang zhu de enhui, weiju zhu de xingfa. Ni de zhu de xingfa shi yinggai fangbei de
Yiqie shi zhen, zai fuhuo ri zhiqian, wo du yao jiayi huimie, huo jiayi yanli de chengfa, zhe shi jilu zai tian jing li de
Wo bu jiang shi jixiang, zhi wei qian ren bu chengren ta. Wo ceng yi mu tuo gei sai mo de ren zuo mingzheng, dan tamen bu chengren ta. Wo jiang jixiang zhishi weile dong xia

Dangshi wo ceng dui ni shuo:“Ni de zhu shi quanzhi zhongren de. Wo suo zhaoshi ni de meng zhao he zai “gulanjing” li suo zuzhou di na ke shu, wo zhi yi zhe liang jian shiwu kaoyan zhongren, bing jiayi donghe, dan wo de donghe zhi shi tamen gengjia manheng.”
Dangshi wo ceng dui zhong tianshen shuo:“Nimen yingdang xiang a dan koutou.” Tamen jiu xiang ta koutou, dan yi bo lie si chuwai. Ta shuo:“Ni yong nitu zaocheng de, wo zen neng xiang ta koutou ne?”
Ta shuo:“Ni gaosu wo ba, zhe jiushi ni shi ta chaoyue wo de ren ma? Ruguo ni kuanxian wo dao fuhuo ri, wo shi bi genjue ta de houyi, dan shaoshu ren chuwai.”
Zhenzhu shuo:“Ni qu ba! Tamen zhong fan shuncong ni de, huo yu biding shi tamen he ni de chongzu de baochou

Ni keyi yong ni de shengyin qu donghe tamen zhong ni suo neng donghe de ren; ni keyi tongshuai ni de qibing he bubing, qu fandui tamen; ni keyi he tamen tong xiang tamen de caichan he ernu; ni keyi xu gei tamen (renhe dongxi)──emo zhi xu gei tamen wangxiang ──
wo de puren, ni dui tamen jue wu quanbing, ni de zhu zu wei jianhu zhe.”
Nimen de zhu wei nimen er shi chuanzhi zai haishang hangxing, yibian nimen xunqiu ta de enhui. Ta dui nimen que shi zhi ci de

Dang nimen zai haishang zaoshou zaihai de shihou, nimen xianglai suo qidao de yi huibi nimenle, er nimen zhiyou qidao zhule. Dangzhu shi nimen ping'an denglu de shihou, nimen beipanle zhu. Ren yuan shi gu en de
Nandao nimen bupa zhu shi nimen lunxian dixia, huo shi feishazoushi de kuangfeng saodang nimen, er nimen buneng wei ziji zhaodao renhe jianhu zhe ma
Nandao nimen bupa zhu shi nimen zai qu hanghai, er shi baofeng xiji nimen, bing wei nimen de gu en er shi nimen chenni, ranhou, nimen buneng wei ziji zhaodao renhe dui wo baochou zhe ma?§
Wo que yi youdai a dan de houyi, wo shi tamen zai lu shang huo haishang du you suo qi cheng, wo yi jiamei de shiwu gongji tamen, wo shi tamen dada di chaoguo wo suo chuangzao de xuduo ren
(Ni ji zhu,) zai na ri, wo jiang zhaohuan mei ge minzu ji qi shibiao. Yi youshou jieshou qi gongguo bu zhe, jiang yuedu ziji de benzi; tamen bu shou yi sihao kui she
Zai jinshi shi mangren zhe, zai houshi reng shi mangren, erqie gengjia mi wu
Tamen que yi shi ni jihu weibei wo suo qishi de jiaoxun, yibian ni jiajie wo de mingyi, er niezao qita de jiaoxun. Name tamen jiu hui ba ni dangzuo pengyou
Yao bushi wo shi ni jianding, ni jihu que yi youdian er qingxiang yu tamenle
Ruguo nayang, wo bi shi ni zai shengqian changshi jiabei de xingfa, zai si hou changshi jiabei de xingfa, shi ni buneng zhaodao renhe ren bangzhu ni lai duikang wo
Tamen que yi shi ni jihu buneng anju guxiang, yibian tamen ba ni zhu chu jingwai. Ruguo nayang, tamen zai ni bei zhu zhihou, zhide douliu yihui'er
Zhe shi zai ni zhiqian wo suo paiqian de zhong shizhe de changdao, ni duiyu wo de changdao buneng faxian renhe biangeng
Ni yingdang jin shou cong chen shi dao heiye de bai gong; bing yingdang jin shou zaochen de bai gong, zaochen de bai gong que shi bei canjia de
Zai yeli de yiduan shijian, ni yingdang jin shou ni suo dang shou de fujia de bai gong, ni de zhu huoxu ba ni ti dao yige zhide chengsong di diwei
Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu a! Qiu ni shi wo shunli er ru, qiu ni shi wo shunli er chu, qiu ni shangci wo cong ni nali fachu de quanbing, yi zuo wo de fubi.”
Ni shuo:“Zhenli yi lailinliao, xuwang yi xiaomiele; xuwang que shi yi mie de.”
Wo jiang shi keyi wei xinshimen zhiliao he gei tamen yi enhui de “gulanjing”, ta zhi hui shi bu yi zhe gengjia kui she
Dang wo shi en yu ren de shihou, ta diaotou bugu; dang ta zaoyu huohuan de shihou, ta bian cheng juewang de
Ni shuo:“Ge ren yi ziji de fangfa er gongzuo, nimen de zhu zui zhidao shei shi geng jin yu zhengdao de.”
Tamen wen ni jingshen shi shenme? Ni shuo:“Jingshen shi wo de zhu de jimi.” Nimen zhi huode hen shao de zhishi
Ruguo wo yiyu, wo shi bi ba wo qishi ni de (“gulanjing”) xiaomie jingjin, ranhou, ni dui wo buneng faxian renhe jianhu zhe
Dan wo wei cong ni de zhu fachu de enhui er (baocun ta), ni de zhu suo shi yu ni de enhui que shi zhongda de
Ni shuo:“Ruguo renlei he jingling lianhe qilai chuangzao yi bu xiang zheyang de “gulanjing”, name, tamen jishi huxiang bangzhu, ye bi buneng chuangzao xiang zheyang de miao wen.”
Zai zhe bu “gulanjing” li, wo wei zhongren que yi shenshu ge zhong biyu, dan zhongren daban buxin
Tamen shuo:“Women jue buxin ni, zhidao ni wei women er shi yidao yuanquan cong dixia yong chu
huozhe ni youyizuo yuanpu, zhongzhizhe ye zao he pu tao, ni shi heliu guanchuan qijian
huozhe ni shi tian ru ni suo shuo di nayang, yikuai kuai di luo zai women de tou shang; huozhe ni qing zhenzhu he zhong tianshen lai (yu women) jianmian

huozhe ni you yi suo huangjin wu; huozhe ni sheng shangtian qu, women jue buxin ni que yi shengtian, zhidao ni jiang shi women yi ben women suo neng yuedu de jingdian.” Ni shuo:“Zansong wo de zhu chaojue wanwu! Wo zhishi yige ceng feng shiming de fanren.”
Dang zhengdao jianglin zhongren de shihou, fang'ai tamen xindao de zhishi tamen de zhe ju hua:“Nandao zhenzhu paiqian yige fanren lai zuo shizhe ma?”
Ni shuo:“Jiaruo dadishang you xuduo tianshen anran buxing, name wo bi cong tianshang jiangxia yige tianshen qu tamen nali zuo shizhe.”
Ni shuo:“Zhenzhu zu wei wo yu nimen zhi jian de jianzheng, ta duiyu ta de purenmen que shi che zhi de, que shi mingcha de.”

Zhenzhu yindao shei, shei jiushi zunxun zhengdao de; zhenzhu shi shei mi wu, ni buneng wei shei faxian zhenzhu yiwai de baohu zhe. Zai fuhuo ri, wo jiang shi tamen you xia you ya you long de pufuzhe jihe qilai, tamen de guisu shi huo yu. Mei dang huoshi jianruo de shihou, wo zengjia tamen de huoyan
Zhe shi tamen de baochou, yinwei tamen buxin wo de jixiang, bingqie shuo:“Women bian cheng kugu he chentu hou, nandao women yiding hui bei fuhuo cheng xinren ma?”§
Nandao tamen bu zhidao ma? Chuangzaole tiandi wanwu de zhenzhu neng chuangzao xiang tamen nayang de ren, bing neng wei tamen queding yige hao wu keyi de qixian, bu yi de renmen zhi yuan buxin
Ni shuo:“Jiaruo wo de zhu de enhui de kucang gui nimen guanli, name, nimen biding yinwei pa kaizhi er kouliu ta de enhui. Ren shi linse de.”

Dang mu sa lailin yiselie ren de shihou, wo que yi shangci mu sa jiu zhong mingxian de jixiang. Ni wen yi wen yiselie ren ba, falao dui ta shuo:“Mu sa a! Wo dique caixiang ni shi zhongle moshu de ren.”
Ta shuo:“Ni queshi zhidao, zhiyou tiandi de zhu neng jiang shi zhexie zuowei mingzheng. Falao a! Wo dique caixiang ni shi yao huimie de.”
Ta yao ba tamen zhu chu jingwai, dan wo shi ta he ta de jundui tongtong yan si
Zai ta miewang zhihou, wo dui yiselie ren shuo:“Nimen juzhu zhege difang ba! Dang houshi de yue qi lailin de shihou, wo yao ba nimen zada de zhaoji lai.”
Wo zhi ben zhenli er jiang shi “gulanjing”, er “gulanjing” ye zhi han zhenli er jiangxia. Wo zhi paiqian ni zuo baoxi xinzhe he jinggao zhe
Zhe shi yi bu “gulanjing”, wo shi ta yiyi mingbai, yibian ni congrongbupo di dui zhongren xuandu ta; wo zhujian de jiang shi ta
Ni shuo:“Nimen keyi xinyang ta, ye keyi buxinyang ta.” Zai jiang shi ta zhiqian yi huode zhishi de renmen, dang ting dao renmen songdu ta de shihou, tamen fufu koutou
Tamen shuo:“Zansong women de zhu chaojue wanwu! Women de zhu de nuoyan biding yao bei luxing.”
Tamen tongkuzhe fufu xiaqu,“gulanjing” shi tamen gengjia gongjing.※

(Ni shuo:)“Nimen keyi cheng ta wei zhenzhu, ye keyi cheng ta wei zhiren zhu. Yinwei ta you xuduo ji youmei de ming hao, nimen wulun yong shenme ming hao chenghu ta,(dou shi hen hao de).” Ni zai bai zhong buyao gao sheng langsong, ye buyao di sheng modu, ni yingdang xunqiu yitiao shizhong de daolu
Ni shuo:“Yiqie zansong, quan guizhenzhu! Ta meiyou shouyang ernu, meiyou tong ta gongxiang guo quan de, meiyou wei mian beijian er she de fuzhu zhe. Ni yingdang zansong ta de zunda.”
Yiqie zansong, quan guizhen zhu! Ta yi duanzheng de jingdian jiang shi ta de pu ren, er wei zai qizhong zhizao renhe pian xie
yibian ta jinggao shiren, zhen zhuyao jiangxia yanli de chengfa; er xiang xingshan de xinshimen baoxi, gaosu tamen jiang shou youmei de baochou
er yong ju qizhong
qie jinggao wangyan “zhen zhu shouyang ernu” de ren
Tamen he tamen de zuxian, duiyu zhe ju hua dou hao wu zhi shi, tamen xinkoukaihe de shuo zhe ju huangmiu juelun dehua
Ruguo tamen bu xin zhe xun ci, zai tamen beili zhihou, ni huoxu wei beishang er zisha
Wo que yi shi dadishang de yiqie shiwu chengwei da di de zhuangshi pin, yibian wo kaoyan shiren, kan shei de gongzuo shi zui youmei de
Wo bi huimie da dishang de yiqie shiwu, er shi da di bian wei huangliang de
Nandao ni yiwei yandong he beiwen de zhuren shi wo de jixiang zhong de yi jian qi shi ma
Dangshi, you ji ge qingnian bi ju shandong zhong, tamen shuo:“Women de zhu a! Qiu ni ba ni nali de enhui shangci women, qiu ni shi women de shiye wanquan duanzheng.”
Wo jiu shi tamen zai shandong li ji nian buneng tingwen
Houlai wo shi tamen suxing, yibian wo zhidao liang pai zhong de na yipai geng neng jisuan tamen suo tingliu de shiqi
Wo ba tamen de gushi, chengshi di gaosu ni, tamen shi ji ge qingnian, tamen xinyang tamen de zhu, er wo gei tamen zengjia zhengdao
Wo ceng shi tamen de xin jianren. Dangshi, tamen zhan qilai shuo:“Women de zhu, shi tiandi de zhu, women jue bu she ta er qidao renhe shenming, fouze, women biding shuo chu bu jin qingli dehua

Women de zhexie tongzu, she ta er chongbai bie de xuduo shenming, tamen zenme buyong yige mingzheng lai zhengshi naxie shenming shi ying shou chongbai de ne? Jiajie zhenzhu de mingyi er zaoyao de ren, you shei bi ta hai bu yi ne?”
Dang nimen liqi tamen he tamen she zhenzhu er chongbai (ouxiang) de shihou, ke bi ju shandong, nimen de zhujiang dui nimen guang shi enhui, bing shi nimen de shiye wei youli de.§

Ni kan taiyang chulai de shihou, cong tamen de shandong de youbian xieshe guoqu; taiyang luoshan de shihou, cong tamen de zuobian xieshe guoqu, tongshi tamen jiu zai shandong de kong chu. Zhe shi zhenzhu de yi zhong jixiang, zhenzhu yindao shei, shei zunxun zhengdao; zhenzhu shi shei mi wu, ni jue buneng wei shei faxian renhe pengyou zuowei yindao zhe

Ni yiwei tamen shijuexing de, qishi tamen shi hanshui de, wo shi tamen zuoyou fanzhuan, tamen de gou shen zhao liang tiao tui wo zai dongkou. Ruguo ni kanjian tamen, ni bi xia de zhuan lian er tao, manhuai kongbu

Wo ruci shi tamen juexing, yibian tamen huxiang xunwen, qizhong youyigeren shuo:“Nimen douliule duojiu?” Tamen shuo:“Women douliule yitian, huo bu dao yitian.” Tamen shuo:“Nimen de zhu zui qingchu nimen douliu de shijian de. Nimen pai nimen zhong de yige ren, daizhe nimen de zhexie yinbi dao cheng li qu, kan kan shei jia de shipin zui qingjie, jiao ta maidian shipin lai gei nimen, yao jiao ta hen jinshen, buyao shi renhe ren zhidao nimen
Cheng li de ren, ruguo nazhe nimen, jiang yong shitou da si nimen, huozhe qiangpo nimen xinfeng tamen de zongjiao, name, nimen jiu yong bu hui chenggongle.”

Wo zheyang shi bieren kuijian tamen, yibian tamen zhidao zhenzhu de nuoyan shi zhenshi de, fuhuo de shike shi hao wu keyi de. Dangshi, tamen wei ci shi er zhenglun, tamen shuo:“Nimen zai tamen de sizhou xiuyi du weiqiang ──tamen de zhu shi zui liaojie tamen de.” Zhuchi shiwu de ren shuo:“Women biding zai tamen de sizhou jianzhu yi suo libaisi.”

Youren jiang shuo:“Tamen shi san ge, di si ge shi tamen de gou.” Youren jiang shuo:“Tamen shi wu ge, di liu ge shi tamen de gou.” Zhe shi youyu caice youxuan. Hai youren jiang shuo:“Tamen shi qi ge, di ba ge shi tamen de gou.” Ni shuo:“Wo de zhu shi zui zhidao tamen de shumu di, ciwai, zhiyou shaoshu ren zhidao tamen. Ni duiyu tamen de shiqing, zhi ke zuo biaomian de bianlun, ni duiyu tamen de shiqing, buyao qingjiao renhe ren.”
Ni buyao wei mou shiqing er shuo:“Mingtian wo yiding zuo na jian shi.”
Chufei tongshi shuo:“Ruguo zhenzhu yiyu.” Ni ruguo wangle, jiu yingdang ji qi ni de zhu, bingqie shuo:“Wo de zhu huoxu zhishi wo bi zhe geng qiejin de zhengdao.”
Tamen zai shandong li douliule sanbai nian,(an yinli suan) tamen you jia jiu nian

Ni shuo:“Zhenzhu shi zui zhidao tamen douliu de shijian de. Wei you ta zhidao tiandi de youxuan. Ta de shi jue zhen ming! Ta de tingjue zhen cong! Chu zhenzhu wai, tamen jue wu yuanzhu zhe, zhenzhu bu rang renhe ren shen yu ta de panjue.”
Ni yingdang xuandu ni de zhu suo qishi ni de jingdian, ta de yanci, jue bushi renhe ren suo neng biangeng de.(She zhenzhu wai) ni jue buneng faxian yi ge yinbi suo

Zai zaochen he wan xi qidao ziji de zhu er qiu qi xiyue zhe, ni yingdang naixin di he tamen zai yiqi, buyao miaoshi tamen, er qiu jinshi shenghuo de fuhua. Wo shi mou xie ren de xin hushi wo de jiaoxun, er shuncong ziji de yuwang. Tamen de xingwei shi guofen de, zhe zhong ren nimen buyao shuncong tamen

Ni shuo:“Zhenli shi cong nimen de zhu jiang shi de, shei yuan xindao jiu rang ta xin ba, shei bu yuan xindao, jiu rang ta buxin ba.” Wo yi wei bu yi de ren, yubeile liehuo, na liehuo de yanmu jiang longzhao tamen. Ruguo tamen (wei gan ke er) qiujiu, jiu yi yi zhong shui gong tamen jieke, na zhong shui xiang liqing nayang shaozhuo ren mian, na yinliao zhen zaogao! Na guisu zhen elie
Xindao er xingshan zhe, wo bi bu shi tamen de shanxing tulao wu chou

zhe deng ren de xiangshou changzhu de leyuan, tamen xia lin zhu he, tamen zai leyuan li, pei jin zhi de shouzhuo, chuan ling luo jinduan de lu pao, kao zai chuangshang. Na baochou, zhen youmei! Na guisu, zhen meihao!§
Ni yi liang geren de qingkuang wei tamen da yige biyu: Wo wei qizhong de yige ren chuangzaole liang ge putao yuan, er wei yi ye zao lin, bingqie yi liang yuan zhi jian di difang wei gengdi
Liang yuan dou chuchan guoshi, hao bu qianque, bing zai liang yuan zhi jian, kaizao yitiao he
Ta fuyou caichan, gu yi jinkua de taidu, dui ta de pengyou shuo:“Wo caichan bi ni duo, ren bi ni qiang.”
Ta zifu de zou jin ziji de yuanpu, shuo:“Wo xiang zhege yuanpu yong bu huangwu
wo xiang fuhuo shike bu hui lailin. Jishi wo bei zhao gui zhu, wo ye neng faxian bi zhe yuanpu geng hao de guisu.”
Ta de pengyou yi bianbo de taidu dui ta shuo:“Ni buxin zaowuzhu ma? Ta chuangzao ni, xian yong nitu, ji yong jingye, ranhou shi ni bian cheng yige wanzheng de nanzi
Danshi (wo shuo), zhenzhu shi wo de zhu, wo bu yi renhe wu pei wo de zhu
Ni zou jin ni de yuanpu de shihou, ni zenme bu shuo:‘Zhe jian shi shi zhenzhu yiyu de. Chu zhenzhu wai, wo jue wu nengli!’ Ruguo ni renwei wo de caichan he housi dou buru ni
name, wo de zhu huoxu hui shangci wo bi ni de yuanpu geng hao de dongxi, er jiang pili yu ni de yuanpu, yizhi (ta) hua wei guangtutu de tudi
huo yuan li de shui yidan ganhe, ni jiu buneng xunqiu.”

Ta de caichan, quan zao huimie. Yuan li de putao jia daota zai dishang, ta wei tongxi jianshe yuanpu de feiyong er fanfu fanzhuan ta de liang zhang, ta shuo:“Dan yuan wo meiyou ba renhe wu pei wo de zhu.”
Chu zhenzhu wai, meiyou qunzhong yuanzhu ta, ta ye buneng zizhu
Zai zheli, yuanzhu quan gui zhenshi de zhenzhu, ta shi shangfa yanming de
Ni wei tamen da yige bifang: Jinshi de shenghuo, youru wo cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, zhiwu de yu, jiu pengbo shengzhang, ji'er lingluo, sui feng piaosan. Zhenzhu duiyu wanshi shi quanneng de
Caichan he housi shi jinshi shenghuo de zhuangshi; chang cun de shangong, zai ni de zhu kan lai, shi baochou geng hao de, shi xiwang geng da de
Zai na ri, wo jiang shi shanyue xiaoshi, ni kan dadi bian cheng guangtutu de. Wo jiang jihe tamen, er bu yilou renhe ren

Tamen jiang fen lie chengxing di jieshou ni de zhu de jianyue. Nimen que yi lai jian wo, youru wo chuci chuangzao nimen de shihou yiyang. Buran, nimen ceng shuo wo jue bu wei nimen queding yige yue qi

Gongguo bu jiang zhanxian chulai, suoyi ni jiang hui kan dao zui renmen weiju qizhong de jilu. Tamen shuo:“Aya! Zhege gongguo bu zenme la? Bulun xiao zui dazui, dou hao bu yilou, yiqie dou jiayi jilu.” Tamen jiang faxian ziji suo zuo de shi dou yiyi jilu zai benzi shang. Ni de zhu bu kui wang renhe ren

Dangshi wo dui zhong tianshen shuo:“Nimen yingdang xiang a dan koutou.” Tamen dou koule tou, dan yi bo lie si chuwai. Ta ben shi jingling, suoyi weibei ta de zhu de mingling. Ta he ta de zisun, shi nimen de choudi, nimen que she wo er yi tamen wei baohu zhe ma? Bu yi zhe de daoxingnishi zhen elie!§
Wo meiyou shi tamen yanjian tiandi de chuangzao, ye meiyou shi tamen yanjian qi zishen de chuangzao, wo meiyou ba shi ren mi wu zhe dangzuo zhushou
Zai na ri, zhenzhu jiang shuo:“Nimen suo cheng wei wo de huoji de, nimen ba tamen zhaohuan lai ba.” Tamen jiu zhaohuan naxie tongshi, dan tamen bu da ying. Wo jiang shi tamen tongguiyujin
Zuifanmen jiang kanjian huo yu, er shenxin bi duo qizhong, wu chu taobi
Zai zhe “gulanjing” li, wo que yi wei zhongren chanshule ge zhong biyu, ren shi zhengbian zuiduo de

Dang zhengdao lailin zhongren de shihou, tamen bu xindao, ye bu xiang tamen de zhu qiurao, na zhishi yinwei tamen yao dengdai (zhenzhu jiang) guren de changdao xianxian yu tamen, huo yanjian xingfa lailin tamen
Wo zhi paiqian shizhemen baoxi xin chuan jinggao, er bu xindao de renmen que yi wangyan xiang zhengbian, yu jie ci fanbo zhenli. Tamen ba wo de jixiang he wo dui tamen de jinggao, dangzuo xiaobing

Youren yi zhu de jixiang jiaohui tamen, dan tamen biqi ta, bingqie wangji tamen yiqian suo fan de zui'e; you shei bi tamen hai bu yi ne? Wo que yi jiang bomo jia zai tamen de xin shang, yimian tamen liaojie jing yi, bingqie zai tamen de er li zao zhong ting. Ruguo ni zhao tamen yu zhengdao, name, tamen jiang yong bu zunxun zhengdao

Ni de zhu que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de. Jiaruo ta wei tamen suo fan de zui'e er chengzhi tamen, name, ta bi wei tamen er cujin xingfa de lailin, dan tamen you ge dingqi, tamen dui nage dingqi, jue buneng huode yige binan suo
Naxie shi zhen de jumin duo xing bu yi de shihou, wo huimie tamen, wo wei tamen de huimie er yuding yige qixian
Dangshi, mu sa dui ta de tong pu shuo:“Wo jiang bu ting bu, zhidao wo daoda liang hai xiangjiao chu, huo jixu luxing ruogan nian.”
Dang ta lia daoda liang hai xiang jiaojie chu de shihou, wangjile ta lia de yu, na wei yu bian ruhai youran er qu
Dang ta lia zou guoqu de shihou, ta dui ta de tong pu shuo:“Na zaofan lai chi! Women queshi zou de pijuanle.”

Ta shuo:“Ni gaosu wo ba, dang women daoda na zuo panshi xia xiuxi de shihou,(wo jiujing shi zenyang de ne?) Wo que yi wangjile na wei yu ──zhi yin emo wo cai wangjile gaosu ni,──na wei yu yi ruhai er qu, na zhen shi guaishi!”
Ta shuo:“Zhe zheng shi women suo xunqiu de.” Ta lia jiu yi lai shi de zuji zhuanshen huiqu
Ta lia faxian wo de yige puren, wo yi ba cong wo zheli fachu de enhui shangci ta, wo yi ba cong wo zheli fachu de zhishi chuanshou ta
Mu sa dui ta shuo:“Wo yao zhuisui ni, xiwang ni ba ni suo xue de de zhengdao chuanshou wo, hao ma?”
Ta shuo:“Ni buneng naixin di he wo zai yiqi
Ni meiyou chedi renshi de shiqing ni zenme neng renshou ne?”
Mu sa shuo:“Ruguo zhenzhu yiyu, ni jiang faxian wo shi jianren de, bu hui weikang ni de renhe mingling.”
Ta shuo:“Ruguo ni zhuisui wo, name,(yu shi) buyao wen wo shenme daoli, deng wo ziji jiang gei ni ting.”

Ta lia jiu tongxing, daole cheng chuan de shihou, ta ba chuan zaole yige dong, mu sa shuo:“Ni ba chuan zaole yige dong, yao xiang shi chuan li de ren yan si ma? Ni que yi zuole yi jian beimiu de shi!”
Ta shuo:“Wo meiyou dui ni shuoguo ma? Ni buneng naixin he wo zai yiqi.”
Mu sa shuo:“Gangcai wo wangle ni de zhufu, qing ni buyao zebei wo, buyao yi wo suo da nan de shi zebei wo!”
Ta lia you tongxing, houlai yujianle yige er tong, ta jiu ba nage ertong shale, mu sa shuo:“Ni zenme wang sha wugu de ren ne? Ni que yi zuole yi jian xiong'e de shile!”
